resources.string: A handy deck of simple full-screen Planning Poker cards, with just enough configurability to let your Agile or Scrum team estimate tasks your way.\nNo ads or other nonsense, just clean, crisp and easy to use.

Tap the button to select the value of your estimate.
To increase or decrease your estimate swipe right or left.
To hide your estimate swipe up. To unhide, swipe up again.
To change the card values to suit those used by your team use the Settings menu.
Source code available on GitHub at\nhttp://bit.ly/plapokplusplus-github
Have comments or a feature request?\nrichardneverett@gmail.com
